meanings.definition: The quality or state of being somewhat green in color.
meanings.sent1: The greenishnesses of the leaves in the garden added a touch of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the greenishnesses of the grass after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The greenishnesses of the paint on the walls made the room feel fresh and lively.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a greenishnesses that reminded me of emeralds.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the greenishnesses of the forest perfectly in the painting.

meanings.definition: The presence of greenish hues or tones.
meanings.sent1: The greenishnesses of the sky at dusk painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent2: The artist used different shades to create a lovely greenishnesses in the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The greenishnesses of the salad made it look fresh and appetizing.
meanings.sent4: The room was bathed in a soft greenishnesses from the stained glass window.
meanings.sent5: The greenishnesses of the ocean water was mesmerizing under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A slight or mild green coloration.
meanings.sent1: The greenishnesses of the apple indicated it was not yet ripe.
meanings.sent2: The greenishnesses of the sky hinted at an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The greenishnesses of the traffic light turned to red, signaling us to stop.
meanings.sent4: The greenishnesses of the moss on the rocks gave a serene feel to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The greenishnesses of the old copper statue showed its age and history.
